Make your voice heard for democracy.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Elections are just around the corner, so using your voice to strengthen voting rights is more urgent than ever. This month, we are coming together to strategize how you and your neighbors can get your state Senators and Representatives to support strong citizen participation.

Join us on Wednesday, July 24 at the next Shawnee County Citizen Participation Strategy Meeting.

Shawnee County Citizen
Participation Strategy Meeting

Protect the right to vote in your county.

Wednesday, July 24, 6 – 7:30 p.m.
Loudlight Office
508 SW 10th Ave
Topeka, KS 66612

RSVP NOW

We know that democracy doesn’t just take place on Election Day, which is why it is so important to voice your values year round. Make sure that your Representatives and Senators hear from you and your neighbors before they go back to the capital.

RSVP now to join us at the next meeting and find out how to make your voice heard.

Onward together,

Melissa Stiehler
Citizen Participation Field Organizer, ACLU of Kansas

P.S. This event is free and open to the public! Make sure you invite your friends and share it on Facebook.
